I'm looking for a talented web designer to give my website, [login to view URL], a modern and trendy facelift. This site was originally created by AI and is currently hosted on Hostinger. - A modern/trendy design style: The redesign should reflect a sleek, up-to-date aesthetic that captures attention and holds interest.
- Use of high-quality images: The new design should incorporate high-resolution images, enhancing the visual appeal and professionalism of the site.
- Implementation of a vibrant color scheme: The use of a lively, engaging color palette is crucial to the redesign. The colors should be well-coordinated and contribute to a cohesive overall look.

I would like to implement a subscription management and auto-renewal feature that operates as follows:

We have integrated custom start and end date picker on cart page so subscription logic should be implemented using those fields

Auto-Renewal and Cancellation: If a subscription reaches its end date and the user has not renewed it, the subscription status should automatically change to "canceled." The associated stock should then be returned to the inventory, making it available for others to purchase. They should also get reminders 7 days and 1 day prior renewal asking for renewal.

Admin Order Page Enhancements: On the admin side, the start and end dates for each subscription should be visible on the order page for better tracking and management.

User Account Dashboard Features: In the user's WooCommerce "My Account" dashboard, the following options should be available:

Manage Subscription: Users can view and manage their active subscriptions.

View Start and End Dates: Users can check the start and end dates of their subscriptions.

Auto-Renewal Settings: Users can enable or disable the auto-renewal feature for their subscriptions.

Cancel Subscription Option: Users can choose to cancel their subscription, which will set it to automatically cancel on the end date.
